Class Fighter

java.lang.Object
entities.Entity
entities.Fighter
Direct Known Subclasses:
Crab, Hero, RabbitOfCaerbannog
public abstract class Fighter extends Entity
An abstract class representing all the characters that can attack
Author:
Lilian
